pr_title: ISPN-12159 Deprecate the Kryo and Protostuff marshallers

timeline.message: ISPN-12159 Deprecate the Kryo and Protostuff marshallers

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            NOTE: The Kryo marshaller has been deprecated in 12.0 and will be removed with no direct replacement in Infinispan 15.0
          
          
            
            
          
          
            
            [NOTE]
          
          
            
            ====
          
          
            
            Kryo marshaller is now deprecated and planned for removal. You should replace any Kyro marshaller usage with ProtoStream marshalling.
          
          
            
            ====
timeline.author: oraNod
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,5 +1,6 @@
 [id='kryo_marshalling']
 = Using the Kryo Marshaller
+NOTE: The Kryo marshaller has been deprecated in 12.0 and will be removed with no direct replacement in Infinispan 15.0
